face.transformationDescription:
[npc.Her] expression begins to shift and distort as it morphs and pushes out into an impossibly-smooth anthropomorphic draconic face, and [npc.her] tongue tapers to fit, taking on a similar draconic form.
[npc.Name] now [npc.has] an anthropomorphic [style.boldSynthetic(draco-synth face)], [npc.materialDescriptor] [npc.faceFullDescription]. Within [npc.her] [npc.mouth], [npc.she] [npc.has] a [style.boldSynthetic(draco-synth tongue)].
face.bodyDescriptionFeral: [npc.SheHasFull] the [npc.feminineDescriptor(true)] face of a feral [npc.legRace], which is [npc.materialDescriptor] [npc.faceFullDescription(true)].
